modName: Skyhighrim - Craftable Drugs - Alcohol - Drunk FX
summary:
Adds craftable, real life drugs and alcohol to Skyrim. All existing mushrooms now cause unique psychedelic visuals after being prepared.
Prepared mountain flowers now provide temporary night vision in their corresponding colours
[EN/JP/RU]
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#88ff00]Check out my new survival PVP project [/color][url=https://www.armyrust.com][color=#88ff00]ARMYRUST[/color][/url]

[heading]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
Adds craftable, real life drugs and alcohol to Skyrim. All existing mushrooms now cause unique psychedelic visuals after being prepared.
Prepared mountain flowers now provide temporary night vision in their corresponding colours
All substances have *realistic* visual fx - [i]there is some exagerration and symbolism involved though[/i]
All substances last a relative amount of time from 5 mins for the powders to 30 for trips and 15-45 for drinks
All have relevant buffs, some positive some negative, and are priced relatively realistically.
[size=1]
Use cocaine and amphetamine to run like the wind and swing your greatsword like it's a switchblade. Eat mountain flowers for easy night vision or just because you like that colour. Drop some Acid to slow things down and psyche out or eat magic mushrooms and go night stalking. Float down a river on heroin or get drunk and start a bar fight. A wealth of wonderfully unique and retarded experiences awaits you in [b][i]Skyhighrim[/i][/b][/size]

[size=2][color=#66ff66]This mod is now a collaboration between me and the scripting legend who brought you [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15506]this epic lightning mod[/url]; [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3256702]Minty911[/url]
Expect major, immersive updates soon![/color][/size]


[heading][color=#66ff66][center][b]You can buy all substances at the various inns & taverns across Skyrim or you can craft them at any cooking apparatus or pickpocket/loot them from citizens[/b][/center][/heading][/color]
[size=3]Only works partially with ENB unless UseOriginalPostProcessing=True or #define APPLYGAMECOLORCORRECTION[/size]
[size=2]This is because of the way ENBseries hijacks Imagespace Modifiers[/size]

Planning to remake lore-friendly version along with next update!

Compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8732]Cannabis Skyrim[/url] and infact weed is a good mixer hehe

[url=http://skyrim.2game.info/detail.php?id=22287]???????[/url]
[url=http://elderscrolls-5.ru/load/skyrim/other/18-1-0-183]??????? ??????? ?????[/url]

[youtube]dXLZD8LtJ-w[/youtube]
[youtube]i8cIahre_HQ[/youtube]

[heading]FEATURES[/heading]
Acid - For tripping balls
Alcohol - For getting drunk
Amphetamine - For going faster
Cocaine - For going faster and longer and talking a lot
Heroin - For numbing the pain
Psilocybin - For more cognitive tripping
[b][color=#ffffff]NEW IN V2[/color][/b]
Blue - Red - Purple Mountain Flowers - Night vision in their respective colours
Fly Amanita, White Cap, Namira's Rot, Imp Stool, Bleeding Crown, Blisterwort, Mora Tapinella, Scaly Pholiota, Glowing Mushrooms - Unique psychedelics that suit their names in varying degrees

[heading]UPDATE HISTORY[/heading]
Update 2.5 : Improved drunk effects, now 2 types - regular drunk and paralytic (very drunk). Paralytic from: Riften special brews, anything rare, alto wines, black briar reserve
Improved other drug visual FX. Added Dragonborn file optional. Next update will be new drugs!
Update 2.1 : Better visuals, more powerful stimulants, general fixes
Update 2.0 : ALL drugs sans Cocaine are now craftable via cooking apparatus!
All Mushrooms need to be prepared for tripping in the same way as do mountain flowers :D
Update 1.1 : Cocaine is now the Skooma replacement, Moon Sugar is now Unrefined Cocaine

[heading]INSTALLATION[/heading]
Unpack .rar contents to Data
